price: 94. arho masri baaxok Yuusuf kamis luk tewqeeh baxsimte waqdi, ken abba Nabii Yaq-qhuub isi gării suge marak anu diggah Yuusuf suruy geyaah yot xaaxah yan, ebebeeh kas cabe yok axce wayteenik keenik iyye.
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
